Replying to @BrettStark 2020-03-21 19:11
@BrettStark @freeCodeCamp Hi Brett! Note that the src path to the js is “/js/vibe.js”. Since that’s root relative, a browser will not find it if the index file is just opened from the file system. (It would if the path was “./js/vibe.js”) But “npm start” will serve it all up for you with a local server.
